messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Help needed!!
messages.msgSnippet: thanks Ren~Pat Ren Allen  wrote: how can I get these magazines? they sound like just the magazine I need. ~Pat Hi Pat! Here s a
messages.messageBody:
thanks Ren~Pat

Ren Allen <starsuncloud@...> wrote:
"how can I get these magazines?
they sound like just the magazine
I need.
~Pat"

Hi Pat! Here's a link for Life Learning:
http://www.lifelearningmagazine.com/

And here is the link for Live Free Learn Free, a newer unschooling
mag: http://www.livefreelearnfree.com/

I think they're wonderful and truly unschoolish.:) Enjoy.

Ren
